Sequence Information.Family: Derived from the peptide CP26, CP29, CEME and CEMA
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=5 μg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium (MIC=29 μg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa K799 (MIC=32 μg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa Z61 (MIC=19 μg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa H744 (MIC=4 μg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa H547 (MIC=32 μg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry

Literature.Title: Biological properties of structurally related alpha-helical cationic antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Scott MG, Yan H, Hancock RE.
